message: Hi everyone, let's aim for high contributions to the public fund this round! Cooperation is essential to maximize our earnings and do well in this game. Let's work together!
I suggest we all contribute significant amounts to maximize our returns. I'll watch contributions carefully and expect fairness. Cooperation benefits everyone, but free-riding hurts us all.
Let's all contribute our full $20 to maximize returns. If everyone does this, we each get $32 back. Full cooperation benefits everyone. I'll contribute everything.
